content: मंड् {vI.v} {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {c10c} <ab>U.</ab> (मंडति, मंडयतिते, मंडित) {@--1@} To adorn, decorate; प्रभवति मंडयितुं वधूरनंगः <ls>Ki. 10. 59</ls>; <ls>Bk. 10. 23.</ls> {@--2@} To rejoice. {vII.v} {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> (मंडते) {@--1@} To clothe, dress. {@--2@} To surround, encompass. {@--3@} To distribute, divide.
